name: CollatorOptions
summary: Options to be passed into the constructor method.

properties.name: caseFirst
properties.summary: Indicates if upper case or lower case characters should sort first.
properties.description:
Can be set to one of the following:

  • 'upper' Upper case characters are sorted before lower case characters.
  • 'lower' Lower case characters are sorted before upper case characters.
  • 'false' Use the locale's default case handling.

This option is ignored on Android.

properties.name: ignorePunctuation
properties.summary: Indicates if punctuation characters should be ignored during the compare.

properties.name: localeMatcher
properties.description:
Can be set to 'lookup' or 'best fit'.

This option is ignored on Android.

properties.name: numeric
properties.summary: Indicates if numbers in string should be compared as integers.
properties.description:
When set true, strings containing numbers will be sorted as '1' < '2' < '10' by their numeric value instead of by their character codes.

This option is ignored on Android.

properties.name: sensitivity
properties.description:
Can be set to one of the following:

  • 'base' Strings that differ in base letters are unequal. For example a !== b, a === 치, a === A
  • 'accent' Strings that differ in base letters and accents are unequal. For example a !== b, a !== 치, a === A
  • 'case' Strings that differ in base letters or casing are unequal. For example a !== b, a === 치, a !== A
  • 'variant' Strings that differ in base letters, accents, or casing are unequal. For example a !== b, a !== 치, a !== A

properties.name: usage
properties.summary: Indicates if the comparison is for sorting or searching when matching strings.
properties.description:
Can be set to 'sort' or 'search'.

This option is ignored on Android.
